item.Q:

to diminish; to demote; reduce or devaluate; disparage; censure; depreciate
item.A:
贬 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 貶
biǎn

裹 (strokes unavailable)
guǒ
包裹 bāoguǒ wrap up; bind up; bundle; package

焰 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 燄
yàn
火焰 (火燄) huǒyàn blaze; flame

朦 (strokes unavailable)
méng
朦胧 (朦朧) ménglóng blur

芽 (strokes unavailable)
yá
发芽 (發芽) fāyá germinate

traditional: 啞
1: yā 2: yǎ
哑巴 (啞巴) yābā dummy 哑巴 (啞巴) yǎba mute; muted; a dumb person; to be dumb

réngjiù still (remaining); to remain (the same); yet
